{{book |title=Parma Eldalamberon 20
The Qenya Alphabet | image = Parma Eldalamberon 20.jpg |author=[[J.R.R. Tolkien]] |editor=[[Arden R. Smith]] |publisher=[[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]] |date=[[3 August]] [[2012]] |format=Paperback journal |pages=160 }} '''''Parma Eldalamberon 20: The Qenya Alphabet''''' is the twentieth issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. Front cover: manuscript facsimile ''"Qenya Alphabet"'' {{PEnav|19|21}} ==Contents== * "The Qenya Alphabet" — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Arden R. Smith ** Introduction ** Texts and Commentary
(contains 40 specimens of tengwar-style Elvish script) * List of abbreviations ==Description== '''"The Qenya Alphabet"''' is an edition of Tolkien's charts and notes from ''circa'' 1931 dealing with the earliest version of the script essentially of the conceptual type he would later call "Fëanorian Tengwar" and eventually include in ''The Lord of the Rings''. This issue of ''Parma Eldalamberon'' contains 40 documents in which Tolkien's examples of the scripts are reproduced in facsimile. The documents include different versions of a detailed explanation of the use of the script for representing English, both phonetically (as it was designed to be used) and also according to English spelling. These have charts of the theoretical values of the sounds represented by the letters, and various English words and texts written in the scripts. There are also various specimen texts written by Tolkien in the "Qenya Alphabet". These exemplify some conceptual changes in the ''mode'' or assignment of phonetic values to particular letters. There is also a great variety of different styles of writing, ranging from formal "book-hand" to rapidly written cursive. Most of these examples are in English, but there are also texts in ''Latin'', ''Old English'', and ''Old High German''. Transcriptions of the examples and editorial commentary on the dating and historical background are provided. ==External links== * [https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/parma-eldalamberon-20-j-r-r-tolkien/1147044256 Print on demand] (Barnes & Noble) * [https://www.thegreatbritishbookshop.co.uk/products/parma-eldalamberon-20-the-qenya-alphabet Print on demand] (The Great British Bookshop) * [https://muse.jhu.edu/article/513829 Book review] by Edith L. Crowe, [[Tolkien Studies: Volume 10|''Tolkien Studies'' vol.10]] * [http://sacnoths.blogspot.se/2012/09/the-new-arrival-parma-twenty.html The New Arrival: ''Parma'' Twenty] by John D.
